messages.title: A message from Dr Catherine Royce
messages.content: Theresa May is taking us over the cliff edge of a hard Brexit... We need to change Britain’s future!

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Hiring European doctors, nurses, and care workers to staff our hospitals and care for the elderly at home.
Fighting for a chance to vote on the final Brexit deal, opposing a hard Brexit, preserving common security with EU, and ensuring access to new medicines and research.
Protecting school funding in real terms.

mentions.tacticalSituation: A two-horse race here between Conservatives and Liberal Democrats.

issues.brexitEurope: Fighting for a chance to vote on the final Brexit deal, opposing a hard Brexit, preserving common security with EU, and ensuring access to new medicines and research.
issues.education: Protecting school funding in real terms.
issues.governance: Opposing a hard Brexit and the consequences of Theresa May's approach.
issues.health: Hiring European doctors, nurses, and care workers.
issues.immigration: Hiring European workers for NHS and care for the elderly.

leaflet.personalStatement: Theresa May is taking us over the cliff edge of a hard Brexit... We need to change Britain’s future!

contactInformation.address: Romsey and Southampton North Liberal Democrats, c/o Cornerways, Highwood Lane, Romsey, Hampshire, SO51 9AF

quotes.text: The Liberal Democrats exist to build and safeguard a fair, free and open society, in which we seek to balance the fundamental values of liberty, equality and community...
quotes.source: taken from the Liberal Democrat Constitution

images.caption: Dr Catherine Royce with Liberal Democrat members holding campaign signs.

leaflet.additionalNotes: This General Election will decide the direction of the United Kingdom for the next five years and also its future relationship with Europe for decades to come.
